title: Contact Us - Lamb Cottage Caravan Park
description: Get in touch with Lamb Cottage Caravan Park. Contact us for bookings, inquiries, or general information about our facilities and services.

hero.title: Contact Us
hero.subtitle: We're here to help with all your caravan park needs

content.introduction: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're planning a visit, have questions about our facilities, or need assistance with your booking, our friendly team is here to help.
content.office_hours:
Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Sunday: 10:00 AM - 2:00 PM

emergency_contact.note: For emergencies outside office hours, please call our emergency line or contact local emergency services if required.

booking_information.advance_booking: We recommend booking in advance, especially during peak seasons (Easter to October).
booking_information.deposit_required: A deposit is required to secure your booking.
booking_information.cancellation_policy: Please see our terms and conditions for cancellation policies.

content.directions_note: For detailed directions to our park, please visit our Directions page or contact us directly.

social_media.facebook: Follow us on Facebook for updates and special offers
social_media.note: Stay connected with us on social media for the latest news and seasonal updates.
